current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit the Secretary of Veterans Affairs from altering available health care and wait times
			 for appointments for health care for certain veterans, and for other
			 purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Continuing Care for Veterans Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Continuing Care for Veterans Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not alter the hospital care, medical services, or other
			 health care available to a veteran who is enrolled in the patient
			 enrollment system of the

, or the amount of time such veteran is
			 required to wait for an appointment for such care or services based solely
			 on the length of time since such veteran has last received such care or
			 services from the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 1705
			 of title 38, United States Code

header.#text:
Prohibition on altering available health care and wait times for appointments for health care for
			 certain veterans
